candidates.title: factor, stdbuf, timeout, uname, uptime: update dependencies
candidates.body:
I have begun to update our dependencies,  The most important update is probably `factor`, since there was a security issue in versions of `smallvec` before 0.6.14 (although I'm not sure it actually affects our code).

You can merge this now (in which case I'll submit more PRs like this) or just wait a few days for me to update everything.

candidates.title: Fix macOS aarch64 compile errors
candidates.body: Fixing macOS aarch64 compile errors. df was bringing in an x86 symbol and libc had to be bumped so 'cp' would link properly.

candidates.title: numfmt: replace getopts with clap
candidates.body:
Hi! This small contribution converts argument parsing in the numfmt utility from getopts to clap.

The test suite passes and clippy and rustfmt are happy.

Please let me know if I can improve this PR.

Thanks!

candidates.title: migrate from getopts to clap in `split`
candidates.body: mind that those TODO I added are markers for ongoing development

candidates.title: Various fixes to prepare the 0.0.3 release
factor: Get rid of the custom `OverflowingAdd` trait
realpath: move to clap & add tests
unbreak build with rustc 1.32: force tempfile 3.1.0
tail: moving to clap from getopt
candidates.body: See #1683 for past commit log. I was unable to squash properly into the same branch even after spending almost an hour, so I closed that PR ._.

candidates.title: ls: move from isatty (deprecated) to atty
pin byteorder, version 1.4 fails with Rust 1.32
